properties.wc_adeqdes: The quality of water in this area is high in fluoride, arsenic and radio neuclides.
properties.fac_propos: The quality of water in this area is high in fluoride, arsenic and radio neuclides. Individual wells need to be replaced with public system with treatment. Needs new wastewater treatment system.
properties.fac_comcap: Local community is lacking in financial, managerial, and technical capacity.

properties.wc_adeqdes: This area has high incidence of fluoride, arsenic and radionuclides. Water hasn't been tested but other systems in the same geographic area has demonstrated those contaminants.
properties.fac_propos: The quality of water in this area is high in fluoride, arsenic and radio neuclides. Individual wells need to be replaced with public system with treatment.
properties.fac_comcap: Local community is lacking in financial, managerial, and technical capacity.

properties.fac_propos: Groundwater levels are dropping below well screens due to drought. New water source is needed. The septic systems in this colonia are generally not permitted and are poorly maintained.
properties.fac_comcap: Local community is lacking in financial, managerial, and technical capacity.
properties.fac_feasib: Low customer base, high cost, low capacity

properties.wc_adeqdes: Low pressure, poor electricity service for pumps, poor construction of distributrion system.
properties.wc_hlthdes: Arsenic is naturally occurring in high levels in this area. All individual wells should be assumed to have high arsenic levels. No testing has been done individual wells.
properties.ww_adeqdes: Septic tanks have been installed without appropriate permits and may or may not be operating properly.
properties.fac_propos: Provide arsenic treatment for all 200 groundwater wells
properties.fac_comcap: No capacity exists within communities due to their small size, language barrier, lack of technical training. However, area-wide organizations exist to provide leadership and support construction.
properties.fac_tades: Outreach and training if point-of-use treatment to be used
properties.fac_feasib: No local leadership due to small size (12 units) of each of the 200 MHP.

properties.fac_comcap: City needs funding/has capacity

properties.con_notes: City of Somerton needs funding to connect this area to their system

properties.wc_adeqdes: The residents cannot drink the water due to its quality. They are on septic tanks. No sewer. City of Carlsbad received $109,000 from Colonias funds from New Mexico Finance Authority for PER for w and ww impr and connecting to the City water system.
properties.fac_propos: The residents cannot drink water. The City of Carlsbad received $109,000 from Colonias NMFA funds for w and ww impr for tying into the City water system. The majority of the households do not have potable water and there is no ww services in place.
properties.fac_comcap: The City of Carlsbad has the capacity
properties.fac_feasib: Developing capacity and securing the funding
